rows.label: qst720201_msg0001
rows.name:
So you say the 4th Decade found
traces of Metsu's destruction. And
that would be where?

rows.label: qst720201_msg0002
rows.name:
It would appear to be at Valafum Hill,
heading inland from Ordia Great Plains.

rows.label: qst720201_msg0003
rows.name:
But I'm afraid I've received no further
information. We have no recourse but
to go and examine the area ourselves.

rows.label: qst720201_msg0004
rows.name:
From here, it's probably even closer
than the harbor.

rows.label: qst720201_msg0005
rows.name: Indeed. Then that is where we must go.

rows.label: qst720201_msg0006
rows.name:
Perhaps you can entertain us with tales
of your adventures as we make our
way, Adel!
